name: v4.2.4
body: - Fix Azure URL when repo name has .git postfix

name: v4.2.3
body:
- Fix Azure URL when using SSH protocol
- Fix Azure URL line selection
- Remove poll notification

name: v4.2.2
body: - Replace the `Check commit on remote` option with a more general `Check remote` option that disables all checks on the remote.

name: v4.2.1
body:
- Fix platform auto-detection when cloning projects
- Add auto-detection support for Bitbucket server and gerrit

name: v4.2.0
body:
- Switch URL library
- Fix issue removing custom domains
- Add `Gerrit` support

name: v4.1.8
body: - Rename 'Host' option to 'Platform'

name: v4.1.7
body: - Do not disable actions during project indexing

name: v4.1.6
body: - Trim forward slash character in file path substitution

name: v4.1.5
body: - Revert host detection fix

name: v4.1.4
body: - Strip user info component from the generated URL

name: v4.1.3
body: - Internal refactor

name: v4.1.2
body: - Fix host detection when opening a new project within the IDE.

name: v4.1.1
body:
- Make 'main' the default fallback branch, replacing 'master'
- Fix issue validation custom host URL templates
- Don't allow duplicate domain registration

name: v4.1.0
body: - Allow custom domain registration for supported hosts.

name: v4.0.9
body: - Add Gitee host

name: v4.0.8
body:
- Add host poll notification
- Add 'Do not show again' button to performance tip notification

name: v4.0.7
body:
- Add experimental host Chromium
- Add resolve context middleware
- Dismiss notifications when action pressed

name: v4.0.6
body: - Fix Azure DevOps url templates

name: v4.0.5
body: - Fix line selection around collapsed code sections

name: v4.0.4
body:
- Add pipeline to handle URL logic
- Fix typos

name: v4.0.3
body:
- Add support for Ukraine in README
- Add notification on successful copy action
- Improve notification messages
- Make some notifications sticky
- Add request for support notification

name: v4.0.2
body:
- Add images to README
- Add Open Collective link to README
- Fix issue where the '#' character in a file name is not correctly encoded.

name: v4.0.1
body:
- Fixed settings button opening the wrong menu.
- Add shortcuts to editor gutter. #166

name: v2.0.0
body: [Open in Git host-2.0.zip](https://github.com/ben-gibson/jetbrains-open-in-git-host/files/1329305/Open.in.Git.host-2.0.zip)
